Articles.Content:
I am experiencing an issue where the flag in the VAB flickers. 

Anyone else having this issue? If so, how did you fix it?

Image: http://imgur.com/a/bNKMo
Unfortunately there is no fix for this at this time, but KSP 1.2 should use a newer version of the Unity3D engine and that should address compatibility issues with the older OSX gpu drivers.

3 hours ago, sal_vager said:

Unfortunately there is no fix for this at this time, but KSP 1.2 should use a newer version of the Unity3D engine and that should address compatibility issues with the older OSX gpu drivers.

I'm running OS X El Capitan (10.11.5) on a 2015 Macbook Pro with an intel core i5, 8 GB of memory, and Intel Iris graphics. Is the flickering flag still supposed to happen? (Doesn't affect the gameplay though. It just makes some KSP-OCD people a little bit jittery...)
Yes the flickering will still happen with OSX 10.11.05, the bug seems to be in Unity rather than OSX though.
